item.title: How To Trace Your System Calls On Mac OS
item.description: DTruss DTruss is analog of strace in linux and uses DTrase for it. It allows you to trace system calls from a running process or run a process with tracing. Note But from past versions of Mac OS, some paths are protected by SIP(System Integrity Protection) (i.e. /usr/bin) and cannot be traced. But there is a workaround, to change settings in recovery mode but I would not recommend it to you.
